name: intia-assurance
description: INTIA Assurance Management System - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
